patthana21.18:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.18:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paccayā hetu vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.18:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
